column4: i downloaded a a file from ATI for my video card, it has a *.run extension...... double clicking on it doesn't work, how do i run this?

anyone can help me with this? i installed amd64 version of ubuntu on an Acer Ferrari laptop ... tried to installed the wireless card which seems to be ok..... it spotted the wireless networks of my neighbours and mine however when i try to connect to mine it says sucess, when i ping yahoo.com or try using any network however, i get "no active connection" .... anyone knows how i can find out the problem?
is the Access Point connected to the Internet ?
you can seem me typing can't you?
